column5: Is your workplace clean and tidy?
column6: Is waste material properly disposed of?
column7: Is there enough room to work?
column8: Are the mops and mop buckets clean and/or empty?
column9: Does the first aid kit in the area have adequate supplies?
column10: Is the cabinet accessible and clean?
column11: Are Employees/Students familiar with applying first aid in the event of an accident?
column12: Is there and are you using appropriate Personal Protective Equipment?
column13: Do all chemical dispensers including stored chemicals have secondary containment?
column14: Are you disposing of chemicals (cleaning supplies) in an appropriate manner?
column16: Are all Safety Data Sheets (SDS) accessible and up to date?
column17: Are emergency phone numbers posted in a visible area?
column18: Is information Safety Information Station current?
column21: Are Emergency procedures current and posted?
column22: Are appropriate signs posted and visible?
column23: Is the facility free of insect and rodent infestation?
column24: Are dumpster lids kept closed and dumpster areas kept clean and organized?
column26: Are equipment and supplies stored properly (shelving, designated areas) and not on the floor?
column27: Floors are clean of all slipping risks?
column29: Do any of the light fixtures need new bulbs or tubes?
column32: Are your shelves in good working order?
column33: Are they secured to the wall and/or floor?
column36: Are supplies stored on shelves weighing over 30 lbs above a reasonable accessible height? (5 feet)
column37: Is there a ladder or a step stool available to reach objects stored above arms reach?
column39: Objects stored in an orderly fashion
column40: Electrical cords, plugs and sockets are in good condition
column42: Extension cords are not a tripping hazard?
column43: All electrical equipment is tested and maintained regularly?
column44: Training has been provided to Faculty/ Students in electrical safety of associated culinary equipment
column45: There is a safety guard on appropriate culinary equipment
column47: All table-top machinery is fixed securely to the benchtop
column48: All Employees/Students have been trained for an emergency drill in the event of a gas leak
column49: At least one type K (Kitchen) fire extinguisher is in the kitchen
column50: Extinguishers have been inspected for the month
column51: Diagram of Evacuation Route is posted at entrances of Kitchen
column52: Hoods, ducts, and grease filters are visibly free of grease
column53: Towels, curtains, and other flammables located away from heat sources
